domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @BarackObama CLIMATE?  CLIMATE?  THIS is the topic you’re using as a CALL-TO-ARMS to the American populous???  At THIS time? As COVID-19 is crushing lives and families, you wanna preach man’s impact on CLIMATE?  Are you kidding me - are you THAT detached from reality?  Whoa.
